text: Lourdes Olivera (born 16 December 1970) is a former synchronized swimmer from Mexico. She competed in both the women's solo and the women's duet competitions at the 1988 and . == References == Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican synchronized swimmers Category:Olympic synchronized swimmers of Mexico Category:Synchronized swimmers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Synchronized swimmers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Synchronized swimmers at the 1991 World Aquatics Championships Category:Pan American Games medalists in synchronized swimming Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for Mexico Category:Synchronized swimmers at the 1991 Pan American Games
title: Lourdes Olivera
